title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, November 22, 2020
description: It's the birthday of novelist George Eliot (1819-1880), who said, "My only desire is to know the truth, my only fear to cling to error."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of novelist George Eliot (1819-1880), who said, "My only desire is to know the truth, my only fear to cling to error."
